creator: Swisscom Directories AG
descriptionHtml:
Think every municipality in Switzerland is the same? Think again! Every part of Switzerland is unique. And with Localcities, you can discover all the features of your area in a single app. You can now see everything you need to know about your municipality in just a few clicks, and can stay up to date with what’s going on.

A local focus.

We want to help you find what you need – local and nearby. For example, you can discover clubs – or create a professional profile for your club. The waste collection calendar will help you keep things clean, while the holiday calendar means you can plan your next trip today. And Localcities can offer you even more:

• Clubs: Discover what local clubs have to offer and create a professional profile for your club.

• Waste collection calendar: Never worry about your waste again – thanks to the up-to-date waste collection calendar with collection dates for your municipality.

• Holiday calendar: Anticipation is half the fun – with the overview of all school holidays and public holidays in your municipality, you can start planning your next trip right now.

• Municipality contacts: Get an overview of public offices and important contacts in your municipality, including phone numbers and opening hours.

• Events: Always know what’s going on – you’ll never miss an event again with the local event calendar.

• Parking: Never double-park again! In selected cities, you can quickly find car parks with free spaces and permit parking spaces for longer-term parking.

• Weather: Umbrella or sun cream? With our weather service for your area and forecasts for the next seven days, you’ll never find yourself caught out. And with the webcam for your municipality, you can also check the weather live.

• Telephone directory: Whether for a personal or business call, you can look up all private and company addresses with telephone numbers in your area.

• Emergency numbers: With all the local and national emergency numbers at hand, you’re always on the safe side.

• Maps: Now you can always find your bearings – with detailed maps of all Swiss municipalities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We have improved our Yellow Pages and our phone book search. But that’s not all. You can now easily change the municipality in the main menu. In addition, the filters for the waste collection calendar are now also saved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We redesigned the municipality screen to give you a more compact overview of your municipality. Plus, you can now share links to Localcities events and clubs on all your favourite social media channels. We also squeezed in a few other minor improvements and a couple of bug fixes.

• Emergency numbers: With all the local and national emergency numbers at hand, you’re always on the safe side.

• Maps: Now you can always find your bearings – with detailed maps of all Swiss municipalities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Visual improvements, performance improvements and bug fixes.

title: Localcities. Swiss municipalities

creator: Swisscom Directories AG
descriptionHtml:
Think every municipality in Switzerland is the same? Think again! Every part of Switzerland is unique. And with Localcities, you can discover all the features of your area in a single app. You can now see everything you need to know about your municipality in just a few clicks, and can stay up to date with what’s going on.

A local focus.

We want to help you find what you need – local and nearby. For example, you can discover clubs – or create a professional profile for your club. The waste collection calendar will help you keep things clean, while the holiday calendar means you can plan your next trip today. And Localcities can offer you even more:

• Clubs: Discover what local clubs have to offer and create a professional profile for your club.

• Waste collection calendar: Never worry about your waste again – thanks to the up-to-date waste collection calendar with collection dates for your municipality.

• Holiday calendar: Anticipation is half the fun – with the overview of all school holidays and public holidays in your municipality, you can start planning your next trip right now.

• Municipality contacts: Get an overview of public offices and important contacts in your municipality, including phone numbers and opening hours.

• Events: Always know what’s going on – you’ll never miss an event again with the local event calendar.

• Parking: Never double-park again! In selected cities, you can quickly find car parks with free spaces and permit parking spaces for longer-term parking.

• Weather: Umbrella or sun cream? With our weather service for your area and forecasts for the next seven days, you’ll never find yourself caught out. And with the webcam for your municipality, you can also check the weather live.

• Telephone directory: Whether for a personal or business call, you can look up all private and company addresses with telephone numbers in your area.

• Emergency numbers: With all the local and national emergency numbers at hand, you’re always on the safe side.

• Maps: Now you can always find your bearings – with detailed maps of all Swiss municipalities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Visuelle Verbesserungen
• Geschwindigkeitsverbesserungen
• Fehlerbehebungen.
• Datenaktualisierungen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Your municipality now has the ability to categorise messages. Push notifications can be customised so that you only receive notifications that are of genuine interest.
• The categories relating to parking have been expanded: The map now shows parking garages, parking spaces and also P+Rail.
• Visual improvements
• Bug fixes
• Data updates

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We have introduced a new option to receive push notifications for news updates from your municipality's politicians.This allows you to stay up-to-date with the latest news and developments. Additionally, we have made upgrades to our push notification services that will improve your user experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this update, we've introduced a number of improvements to the politician profiles. Politicians can add key information to their profile, present the projects that they are involved in and share information via the new "10 Questions" section. We've expanded the contact section for politicians to include email, telephone numbers and more social networks. We’ve also improved the performance and fixed some bugs.

The waste collection calendar will help you keep things clean, while the holiday calendar means you can plan your next trip today. And Localcities can offer you even more:

• Clubs: Discover what local clubs have to offer and create a professional profile for your club.

• Waste collection calendar: Never worry about your waste again – thanks to the up-to-date waste collection calendar with collection dates for your municipality.

• Holiday calendar: Anticipation is half the fun – with the overview of all school holidays and public holidays in your municipality, you can start planning your next trip right now.

• Municipality contacts: Get an overview of public offices and important contacts in your municipality, including phone numbers and opening hours.

• Events: Always know what’s going on – you’ll never miss an event again with the local event calendar.

• Parking: Never double-park again! In selected cities, you can quickly find car parks with free spaces and permit parking spaces for longer-term parking.

• Weather: Umbrella or sun cream? With our weather service for your area and forecasts for the next seven days, you’ll never find yourself caught out. And with the webcam for your municipality, you can also check the weather live.

• Telephone directory: Whether for a personal or business call, you can look up all private and company addresses with telephone numbers in your area.

• Emergency numbers: With all the local and national emergency numbers at hand, you’re always on the safe side.

• Maps: Now you can always find your bearings – with detailed maps of all Swiss municipalities.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes

title: Localcities: Municipality App

creator: Swisscom Directories AG
descriptionHtml:
Think every municipality in Switzerland is the same? Think again! Every part of Switzerland is unique. And with Localcities, you can discover all the features of your area in a single app. You can now see everything you need to know about your municipality in just a few clicks, and can stay up to date with what’s going on.

A local focus.

We want to help you find what you need – local and nearby. For example, you can discover clubs – or create a professional profile for your club. appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've introduced a new “Personalities” section in which athletes can display their profiles. This allows you to find out about the personalities in your local area. We've also made some small but useful improvements to the "Add to Calendar" feature, for example to show more information about saved events. In iOS, events are now created in a separate calendar.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update, we have introduced an image gallery function for politician news and club news, which allows respective authors to add a cover image and up to 19 additional images to their articles!
We have also fixed a few minor bugs to keep things running smoothly.

title:
Localcities: Municipality App
8.0.0

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The municipality news articles can now display an image gallery.
Club owners also have something new: Now the club profile can show photos of the club contacts.
We also fixed a bug that sometimes caused club profiles to crash the app.
